title: Invasion (Onslaught) ðŸ˜•
body: Anyone else having issues completing the mission where you need an a or higher? I have the mission unlocked, so did my friends whom i qued with. When we won with an A rank they all got the reward but me. Did I do something wrong? It says I have 0/1 for that particular mission still. Did i need to complete more than one mission before I can complete that one? Maybe its a glitch or am I just r%%%%%ed  ðŸ˜•

replies.body:
It's probably just due to the bad route of mission.

The fact that the "A or better grade" mission is unlock only when the "win with adc/utility/mage" is finished make it really frustrating and confusing for poeple.

Overall, I personnaly find those mission to be the worst of the worst in term of enjoyment. (and I'm a completionist so giving up that premade icon hurt me a bit)

I mean, they state in their ask riot that mission who force you to play off role, lower your chance of succes or straigh up ask you too much to complete them (predefinite order + premade without public chat + 6/7 only hard mode mission) are mission player don't like.
Why the hell would they push a batch of mission with only those kind of annoying ones :s

54367

Saw this bug before but after we played again it was counted.  One other person who had this issue restarted the client and it took care of it too.
You might have completed a different mission when you finished the match with that A or higher. Did you happen to remember which specific match it was that you think should have counted?
